summary: Okay, okay, slightly ridiculous headcanon. There’s a reason Aberforth likes goats so much. It’s not entirely because he and...
body:
Okay, okay, slightly ridiculous headcanon. There’s a reason Aberforth likes goats so much. It’s not entirely because he and Ariana get to spend time looking after them.

It’s because, for reasons none of them can understand, Albus is genuinely terrified of goats.

Seriously. Voldemort is making Horcruxes? He just rolls his eyes and remarks on how unimaginative he is and how Albus could’ve done things much better.

Draco Malfoy has been ordered to kill him? Oh dear, that’s most inconvenient.

The Minister of Magic is being an idiot? Tell him something he doesn’t know.

The love of his life is causing havoc in Europe and he’s the only one who can stop him? Took nearly fifty years, but he did it in the end.

But being around goats? He’d rather face off in another potential duel to the death with the aforementioned love of his life.

Also, I’m chuckling at the image of Albus and Gellert as teenagers, passionately making out in the barn when Albus squeaks and jumps behind a bale of hay. Gellert is thoroughly bewildered when he looks round and only sees a baby goat staring at them.

(Question is…was said baby goat in there the whole time without them noticing, or did Aberforth let it in to scare, or annoy, his brother??)

summary: hey so you know how Professor Trelawney "predicts” the death of one student per year (according to McGonagall)? what if, two...
body: hey so you know how Professor Trelawney “predicts” the death of one student per year (according to McGonagall)? what if, two years before the golden trio, the student whose death trelawney predicted was fred’s?

summary:
“hermione’s second house is ravenclaw!!!”
listen i don’t care what bullshit rowling has tricked you into but hermione does NOT...
body:
“hermione’s second house is ravenclaw!!!”

listen i don’t care what bullshit rowling has tricked you into but hermione does NOT fit in ravenclaw

she’s not open-minded, she’s not creative, she’s not intellectual, she’s not introverted, she’s not non-judging, etc

like basically the only ravenclaw trait she really has is “““smart””” & having only one house trait of a specific house is not enough to be sorted into it

i also don’t want that dickhead in my house

bye

summary: Daniel Radcliffe über seine Alkoholsucht: "Ich dachte, Schauspieler müssen coole Trinker sein"
title: Daniel Radcliffe über seine Alkoholsucht: "Ich dachte, Schauspieler müssen coole Trinker sein"
body:
Vor der Kamera stand Daniel Radcliffe bereits mit zehn Jahren – und “Harry Potter” brachte dem Schauspieler bekanntermaßen den ganz großen Weltruhm. Diesem Druck hielt er nicht immer stand: Schon früh griff Radcliffe regelmäßig zum Alkohol. In einem Interview sprach der 29-Jährige nun erstaunlich offen über seine Sucht.

Wie überstehe ich nur die nächste Mathe-Klausur? Was wünsche ich mir zum Geburtstag? Möchte ich lieber Judo oder Fußball lernen? Diese oder ähnliche Fragen sind es wohl, mit denen sich 10-jährige Kinder normalerweise beschäftigen sollten.

“Harry Potter”: So sieht Dudley Dursley heute aus

Bei Daniel Radcliffe war das ein bisschen anders: Während sich seine Freunde über die normalen Herausforderungen im Kindesalter Gedanken machen durften, stand er schon längst vor der Kamera und verfolgte sein Lebensziel: ein ausgezeichneter Schauspieler zu werden. Das ist ihm in Rekordzeit gelungen. Dabei kamen die Schattenseiten für Radcliffe genauso überraschend wie der Weltruhm.

“Ich fühlte mich beobachtet und betrank mich”

“Die Erwartung ist, dass du einfach die ganze Zeit glücklich sein solltest. Du hast einen tollen Job, du bist wohlhabend, du hast also kein Recht dazu, je traurig zu sein oder dich nicht dauernd über all das zu freuen. Das übt auch Druck aus”, so der Schauspieler im Interview mit “The Off Camera Show”.

“Harry Potter”-Star: Rupert Grint weiß nicht, wie viel Geld er hat

Dieser Druck steigerte sich zusätzlich, wenn Radcliffe einfach mal abschalten und um die Häuser ziehen wollte. “Im späten Teenager-Alter fühlte ich mich beobachtet, wenn ich in eine Bar oder einen Pub ging. In meinem Fall war es am einfachsten, die Beobachter zu vergessen, indem ich mich betrank, und dann, als ich sehr betrunken wurde, wurde mir bewusst: ‘Oh, die Leute gucken jetzt sogar noch mehr, weil ich sehr betrunken bin’, also trank ich noch mehr, um das noch mehr zu ignorieren.”

“Selbst an meinem Tiefpunkt liebte ich meinen Job”

Für Radcliffe gehörte Alkohol früher ganz selbstverständlich dazu: “Ein Teil von mir glaubte, Schauspieler müssten verrückte, coole Trinker sein und ich sollte diesem seltsamen Bild davon, wie ich mir einen berühmten Schauspieler vorstellte, nacheifern.”

Jung und erfolgreich: Das sind die einflussreichsten Stars unter 30

Dass er damit völlig falsch lag, versuchte ihm unter anderem “Harry Potter”-Kollege Gary Oldman (Sirius Black) zu vermitteln, der ihm sagte: “Du kannst damit nicht weitermachen, du hast zu viel zu verlieren.” Diese Aussage hätte ihn hart getroffen, wie Radcliffe gegenüber “The Off Camera Show” erzählte. Es waren Menschen wie Oldman und die große Liebe zu seinem Job, die dem Schauspieler schließlich dabei halfen, dem Alkohol abzuschwören. “Selbst an meinem Tiefpunkt liebte ich meinen Job immer noch so sehr.” Der Weg in die Abstinenz hätte einige Jahre gedauert und ein paar Anläufe gebraucht. Heute ist der Schauspieler trocken und “damit viel glücklicher”.

VIDEO: Emma Watson und Tom Felton – Instagram Post lässt Harry-Potter-Fans jubeln

Harry in the half blood prince 
Harry: so I have four suspects 
Ron: four? You have four suspects?!
Harry: it was originally...
body:
Harry in the half blood prince

Harry: so I have four suspects

Ron: four? You have four suspects?!

Harry: it was originally ten. Well … nine technically… I guess… I had Draco on it twice

summary: I'd like to imagine, if Lily's alive in an AU, she would be like: ffs Severus, could you take care of your bloody hair...
body:
I’d like to imagine, if Lily’s alive in an AU, she would be like: ffs Severus, could you take care of your bloody hair sometimes??

Severus: … *Just letting her fix his hair cause he damn loves it*

reblog.comment:

Severus: … *Just letting her fix his hair cause he damn loves it*

blog.name: 12dancingwizards
blog.title: Sirius Black Is Gay
blog.description:
Jk Rowling who? Idk her.

All the characters are now queer poc and anyone who disagrees can fight me. I’m here for positivity about all the houses and running Snape over with my truck. Asks, messages, and submissions are super welcome!! I wanna interact with my followers!

Mod is a lesbian nonbinary slytherin if you were wondering. They/them pronouns please!

Also this is a sideblog. Main is @glitch-h Icon credit: @alessiajontrunfio

summary: Cedric would notice when things were too overwhelming for Harry. He would see when those emerald eyes would grow that faraway...
body:
Cedric would notice when things were too overwhelming for Harry. He would see when those emerald eyes would grow that faraway look, when those narrow shoulders would hunch as if he was trying to disappear in on himself.

It made Cedric angry, how Harry never got a break. How whenever something dangerous happened, he would be forced in the middle against his will, and then everyone around him would pile blame on top of his life being threatened at every turn. As if he asked for any of it.

And it made Cedric sad to see how hard Harry was trying. So much weight for him to carry, too much to ask of anyone, let alone a teenager.

No wonder Harry would grow distant at times.

Sometimes Harry would give him a look, and Cedric knew what he didn’t want to ask. What he maybe didn’t know that he wanted to ask. And Cedric would gather him in his arms and run his fingers through wild black hair, whispering sweet nothings in his ear, promising that he was here to stay.

Slowly but surely, Harry always came back. And Cedric would plant his lips on his forehead and promise him that everything would be okay. He would make sure of it. He would protect the Boy Who Lived, the Boy Who Never Asked For This, if it was the last thing he did.

summary: How many of you thought about that time when Harry was supposed to get his Hogwarts mail and McGonagall wrote a couple of...
body: How many of you thought about that time when Harry was supposed to get his Hogwarts mail and McGonagall wrote a couple of letters again and again because Dursley threw them all away and some day she was just fed up and went total bad ass. She probably was like “fuck that shit” and send the thousands of letters to fuck with the muggles. And then Harry fucks it all up by being to dumb to CATCH ONE FUCKING MAIL THINGY OR GET ONE FROM THE GROUND AND RUN AWAY. MAN FUCK HARRY JUST PUT ONE MAIL THINGY INTO YOUR PANTS AND RUN OUT OF THE HOUSE DAMMIT. Well and then McGonagall sits there, writes another mail thingy, grins and says to Hagrid “I’m through with this bullshit. Let’s fuck with them” and then Hagrid cries because he can give Harry is letter.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!
